name: chill out flight sim
description:
Sit down and listen to the calm music while you flight across the ocean on your seaplane Cessna 172N

W,S - to pitch (up and down)

A,D - to yaw (left and right)

Q,E - to roll

R - to restart

ESC - to close the game

Really basic game made in 1 day,  a lot of bugs (but I "fixed" the animations), but i really wanted to participate in this jam.

The plane and "water texture" were done by me.
Music: 21 - awwbree - Terminal Lover
